# Quickstarts Docs

## MCP client/server

- [Build a minimal MCP client](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/ai/quickstarts/build-mcp-client.md): Learn to create a minimal MCP client and connect it to an MCP server using .NET
- [Build a minimal MCP server and publish to NuGet](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/ai/quickstarts/build-mcp-server.md): Learn to create and connect to a minimal MCP server using C# and publish it to NuGet.
- [Publish to the Official MCP Registry](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/ai/quickstarts/publish-mcp-registry.md): Learn how to publish your NuGet-based MCP server to the Official MCP Registry, including creating a server.json manifest, updating your package README, and using the MCP Publisher tool.

## Quickstarts

- [Connect to and prompt an AI model](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/ai/quickstarts/prompt-model.md): Create a simple chat app using Microsoft.Extensions.AI to summarize a text.
- [Build a chat app](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/ai/quickstarts/build-chat-app.md): Create a simple AI powered chat app using Microsoft.Extensions.AI and the OpenAI or Azure OpenAI SDKs
- [Request structured output](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/ai/quickstarts/structured-output.md): Learn how to create a chat app that responds with structured output, that is, output that conforms to a type that you specify.
- [Build a .NET AI vector search app](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/ai/quickstarts/build-vector-search-app.md): Create an AI powered app to search and integrate with vector stores using embeddings and the Microsoft.Extensions.VectorData package for .NET
- [Execute a local .NET function](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/ai/quickstarts/use-function-calling.md): Create a simple chat app using OpenAI and extend the model to execute a local function.
- [Chat with a local AI model](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/ai/quickstarts/chat-local-model.md): Set up a local AI model and chat with it using a .NET console app and the Microsoft.Extensions.AI libraries
- [Build a minimal AI assistant](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/ai/quickstarts/create-assistant.md): Learn to create a minimal AI assistant with tooling capabilities using .NET and the Azure OpenAI SDK libraries
- [Get started using the AI app templates](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/ai/quickstarts/ai-templates.md): Create a .NET AI app to chat with custom data using the AI app template extensions and the Microsoft.Extensions.AI libraries

## Text to image

- [Generate images using MEAI](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/ai/quickstarts/text-to-image.md): Learn how to use Microsoft.Extensions.AI to generate images from text prompts using AI models in a .NET application.
- [Generate images using OpenAI.Images.ImageClient](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/ai/quickstarts/generate-images.md): Create a simple app using to generate images using OpenAI.Images.ImageClient in .NET.
